name: Flappy Shapes
description:
Background:

Inspired by a classic game - Flappy bird, our team developed our own prototype named Flappy shaped. In this game, we used simple shapes (circles, square, triangle) and only one key (space) to control based on minimalism theory.

How to play:

  • Player has 3 lives and a score counter
  • Try to cross more columns of obstacles and get higher scores
  • If touch the same shape, one point bonus
  • If touch the different shape, lose one life
  • If cross from the space, no bonus and no punishment

Contributor:

  • Tanya, Jain
  • Yuanrui, Chen
  • Yunyi, Zhu
